summary:
üìç So that domain I bought the other day.  It's the new home of my less-technical more-personal blog:

https://srsbsns. lol/new-domain/

My wife and I drove to Nashville last night to attend the final show of A Day To Remember's The Least Anticipated Album Tour, with The Story So Far, Four Year Strong, and Scowl. 
Scowl was loud and kind of chaotic (in the best way), though not really my cup of tea. 
Four Year Strong played a solid set with great energy...
title: A Concert to Remember

summary: My little homelab is bit different from many others in that I don't have a SAN/NAS or other dedicated storage setup.  This can sometimes make sharing files between systems a little bit tricky.  I've used workarounds like Tailscale Serve for sharing files over HTTP or simply scping files around as needed, but none of those solutions are really very elegant...
title: Taking Taildrive for a Testdrive
